mapper.select: SELECT p_no,subject,id,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,rcount,num FROM (SELECT p_no,subject,id,regdate,hit,rcount,rownum as num FROM (SELECT p_no,subject,id,regdate,hit,rcount FROM pbo_4 ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT q_no,subject,id,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, isreply, group_id, group_step, group_tab FROM qbo_4 WHERE isreply!=1 AND group_step!=1 ORDER BY q_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qbo_4(q_no, name, id, subject, content, pwd, group_id, group_step) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(q_no)+1,1) FROM qbo_4), #{name}, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pwd}, #{group_id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_step)+1,1) FROM qbo_4 WHERE group_id=#{group_id}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE qbo_4 SET isreply=isreply+1 WHERE q_no=#{q_no}
